channel.title: SEIU Local 503 at OSU - News
channel.description: News and updates from SEIU Local 503 at Oregon State University.

item.title: Bargaining Observation Time Update: 10:00 AM Moved to 1:15 PM
item.description: The bargaining observation was originally scheduled for 10:00 AM. Around 9:00 AM, management changed it to 1:15 PM. We are sending email updates and have updated the website.

item.title: Show Up on Zoom: Use a 2026 Bargaining Background
item.description: A shared Zoom background is a simple way to show solidarity in bargaining sessions, protect privacy, and keep the focus on our contract. Download the 2026 pack here.

item.title: 2026 Kickoff: Why This Year Matters
item.description: Join the fight for a fair contract. Recap of the Fighting for Higher Ed survey and the path to COLA and benefits. Attend the Jan 15 meeting.

item.title: Fighting for Higher Education
item.description: Join classified workers at Oregonâ€™s Public Universities in the fight for fair wages, benefit protections, and union power. Sign the petition today!

item.title: Your Voice, Our Contract: Bargaining Survey Reminder
item.description: An update from the bargaining committee on the contract survey and the importance of member participation.

item.title: Union Power Delivers
item.description: Victory! Your 3% union-won COLA arrives Nov 1, 2025. See the full breakdown of our last contract's wins and take the crucial 2025 bargaining survey now so we can win again!

item.title: Bowling Night Was a Striking Success!
item.description: A fun-filled bowling night brought our union members together for an evening of strikes, spares, and solidarity.

item.title: Make Your Voice Heard! The 2026 Bargaining Survey is Here!
item.description: The SEIU 503 bargaining survey for the 2026 contract is now open. Share your priorities and help shape our negotiations with OSU management.

item.title: Ice Cream Social Was Sweet!
item.description: Thank you to all the members, family, and friends who joined us for our Solidarity Ice Cream Party outside the Kerr Administration building!
